description.original: This plugin enables you to increase/decrease the size of an image by scrolling
description.translation: This plugin enables you to increase/decrease the size of an image by scrolling

dict..setDesc('Key that needs to be pressed d: .setDesc('鼠标滚轮缩放需要按下指定按键才能工作。')
dict..setDesc('Step value by which the size o: .setDesc('增加/减小图像大小的步长值')
dict..setDesc('Initial image size if no size: .setDesc('如果事先没有定义尺寸，则这里设置的默认图像尺寸初始化尺寸')
dict..setDesc('When enabled, all nodes on the: .setDesc('启用后，画布上的所有节点也可以使用 Modifier 键调整大小')
